title: How to Make a Durable Plastic Book Cover

steps.title: Obtain a heavy duty plastic sheet protector or an 8-10 mil sheet of clear plastic.
steps.content: Obtain a heavy duty plastic sheet protector or an 8-10 mil sheet of clear plastic. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Trim two edges of the sheet protector so that it opens up into a single layer.
steps.content: Trim two edges of the sheet protector so that it opens up into a single layer.

steps.title: Lay your book on the plastic and trace its covers and spine.
steps.content: Lay your book on the plastic and trace its covers and spine. It should make a large rectangle. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Measure the top, bottom, and both side edges of the book.
steps.content: Measure the top, bottom, and both side edges of the book. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Add two inches to the top and bottom measurement, and three to each side.
steps.content: Add two inches to the top and bottom measurement, and three to each side. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Crease the top and bottom one inch wide flaps toward the center of the book.
steps.content: Crease the top and bottom one inch wide flaps toward the center of the book. Press firmly to create a sharp crease. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Fold and crease the 3 inch sections on each side of the book cover in toward the spine.
steps.content: Fold and crease the 3 inch sections on each side of the book cover in toward the spine. Press firmly to create a sharp crease. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Slide your book cover(s) into the pockets formed by the creases.
steps.content: Slide your book cover(s) into the pockets formed by the creases. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Close the book to check for fit.
steps.content: Close the book to check for fit. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Tape the inside and outside layers of plastic together along the book's top and bottom edges, taking care not to stick tape to the book.
steps.content: Tape the inside and outside layers of plastic together along the book's top and bottom edges, taking care not to stick tape to the book.

steps.title: Repeat the process for the other cover with the other end of the plastic.
steps.content: Repeat the process for the other cover with the other end of the plastic.
